Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Darmanian Way, north of the Temple of Clerical Science.
Room.LongDescription: The Temple of Clerical Science is an interesting churched formed as a merging of clerical mysticism and mathematical certainty, bringing together the clergy and technology. Unfortunately, no one in the community really takes them seriously, so very little has come out of this church.
